argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zrh1.l | |- L = ( ZRHom ` R ) |

| 3 | 1 | #P_zrhrhm | |- ( R e. Ring -> L e. ( ZZring RingHom R ) ) |

| 5 | 4, 2 | #P_rhm1 | |- ( L e. ( ZZring RingHom R ) -> ( L ` 1 ) = .1. ) |
